title: Tracking Issue for more const int functions

labels.name: T-lang
labels.description: Relevant to the language team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-libs-api
labels.description: Relevant to the library API team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: B-unstable
labels.description: Implemented in the nightly compiler and unstable.

labels.name: A-const-fn
labels.description: Area: const fn foo(..) {..}. Pure functions which can be applied at compile time.

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

labels.name: Libs-Tracked
labels.description: Libs issues that are tracked on the team's project board.

body:
(none exhaustive) list of `libcore::num`, which should be a `const fn`:

- `feature = const_int_rotate`
  - [x] `rotate_left` #53697 -- stabilized
  - [x] `rotate_right` #53697 -- stabilized
- `feature = const_checked_int_methods`
  - [x] `checked_add` [1] #68809
  - [x] `checked_sub` [1] #68809
  - [x] `checked_mul` [1] #68809
  - [x] `checked_div` [1] #68809
  - [x] `checked_rem` [1] #68809
  - [x] `checked_neg` [1] #68809
  - [x] `checked_shl` [1] #68809
  - [x] `checked_shr` [1] #68809
  - [x] `checked_abs` [1] #68809
- `feature = const_saturating_int_methods`
  - [x] `saturating_add` #58246
  - [x] `saturating_sub` #58246
  - [x] `saturating_mul` [1] #68809
- `feature = const_int_wrapping`
  - [x] `wrapping_add` #53697 -- stabilized
  - [x] `wrapping_sub` #53697 -- stabilized
  - [x] `wrapping_mul` #53697 -- stabilized
  - [x] `wrapping_div` [1] #68809
  - [x] `wrapping_rem` [1] #68809
  - [x] `wrapping_neg` #58044 -- stabilized
  - [x] `wrapping_shl` #53697 -- stabilized
  - [x] `wrapping_shr` #53697 -- stabilized
  - [x] `wrapping_abs` #63786 -- stabilized in 1.39
- `feature = const_int_overflowing`
  - [x] `overflowing_add` #53697
  - [x] `overflowing_sub` #53697
  - [x] `overflowing_mul` #53697
  - [x] `overflowing_div` [1] #68809
  - [x] `overflowing_rem` [1] #68809
  - [x] `overflowing_neg` #58044 -- stabilized
  - [x] `overflowing_shl` #53697
  - [x] `overflowing_shr` #53697
  - [x] `overflowing_abs`  #63786 -- stabilized in 1.39
- `feature = const_euclidean_int_methods`
  - [x] `checked_div_euc` [1] #68809
  - [x] `checked_mod_euc` [1] #68809
  - [x] `wrapping_div_euc` [1] #68809
  - [x] `wrapping_mod_euc` [1] #68809
  - [x] `overflowing_div_euc` [1] #68809
  - [x] `overflowing_mod_euc` [1] #68809
- `feature = const_int_pow`
  - [x] `pow`[1, 2] #68978
  - [x] `is_power_of_two` #65092
  - [x] `next_power_of_two` [1] #68978
  - [x] `checked_pow` [1] #68978
  - [x] `checked_next_power_of_two` [1] #68978
  - [x] `saturating_pow` [1, 2] #68978
  - [x] `wrapping_pow` [1, 2] #68978
  - [x] `wrapping_next_power_of_two` [1] #68978
  - [x] `overflowing_pow` [1, 2] #68978
- `feature = const_int_sign`
  - [x] `abs` #63786 -- stabilized in 1.39
  - [x] `signum` #61635
  - [x] `is_positive` #53697 -- stabilized
  - [x] `is_negative` #53697 -- stabilized
- `feature = const_int_conversion`
  - [x] `to_be_bytes` #53697
  - [x] `to_le_bytes` #53697
  - [x] `to_ne_bytes` #53697
  - [x] `from_be_bytes` #53697
  - [x] `from_le_bytes` #53697
  - [x] `from_ne_bytes` #53697
  - [x] `reverse_bits` #53697
- `feature = const_nonzero_int_methods`
  - [x] `NonZero*::new` [1] #68976

1. Requires conditionals. Tracking Issue: #49146 (implemented on nightly)
2. Requires loops. Tracking Issue: #52000 (implemented on nightly)
